name: Wave Break
description:
Grab and grind to your heart’s content in Wave Break! A spankin' new game from Funktronic Labs, inspired by classic arcade skateboarding games -- with a splash of boating, explosions, and cold-blooded murder.// FEATURES //GRAVITY DEFYING TRICKS
BOAT LOADS OF CUSTOMIZATION
ONLINE AND LOCAL MULTIPLAYER
IMMATURE CONTENT (Rated M for Motorboating)
EXPLOSIONS, GOLD CHAINS, HAIR PRODUCTS, AK47s, and MORE!
Come shout at devs and sign-up for our pre-release Alpha Testing, starting SOON™!
Sign-up deets in our Discord: https://discord.gg/QuuZht6
Send twizzlers: https://twitter.com/funktroniclabs
Or keep it old school: hello@funktroniclabs.com
What happens when you combine watercrafts and pro skateboarding? Pro Water boa… WAVE BREAK!
